sentences.sContent: This often results in huge holes in the ground, noxious spoil-heaps and polluted watercourses.
sentences.sContent_eng: This often results in huge holes in the ground, noxious spoil-heaps and polluted watercourses.
sentences.sCn: 这常常会在地面上留下一个个巨大的坑，有毒的矸子山和污染的河道.

trans.tranOther: A watercourse is a stream or river, or the channel that it flows along
